lead_paragraph: Just about everyone, including people who don't care about golf, knows that American mogul Donald Trump, sometimes known as "The Donald" as if there were no other, owns a course in Scotland.

headline.main: Trip Tips: Controversy Is Par for the Course at Trump's Scots Resort
headline.print_headline: Trip Tips: Controversy Is Par for the Course at Trump's Scots Resort
